steps: step 1: Navigate to category/*
step 2: Click on link Apple
step 3: Click on link New -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
step 4: Click on label storageColorOptions (256GB)
step 5: Click on div ColorOptions
step 6: Select storage color and proceed to checkout
step 7: Click on input FirstName
step 8: Enter input value in input FirstName
step 9: Click on input LastName
step 10: Enter input value in input LastName
step 11: Click on input Address
step 12: Enter input value in input Address
step 13: Enter input value in input ZipCode
step 14: Click on input City
step 15: Enter input value in input City
step 16: Enter input value in input State
step 17: Click on input Phone
step 18: Enter input value in input Phone
step 19: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout#checkout/payment'
step 20: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you#thank-you/*'
step 21: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
